title: HTML Formatting
text: DescriptionYou have been given formatted text and asked to converted it HTML.Each character may be formatted as bold, italic, underlined, or some combination.In HTML, content betweenandtags is bold. Content betweenandtags is italic. Content betweenandtags is underlined.What is the minimum number of properly nested HTML tags needed to produce a given format?For example, say we wanted to formatLookAtMe!LookAtMe! has incorrectly nested tags.LookAtMe! has correctly nested tags, but is longer than necessary.LookAtMe! is the shortest and uses the fewest number of tags.InputThere will be a sequence of 1 to 20,000 numerals. Each numeral denotes the formatting at that position.0 - no formatting1 - bold2 - italic3 - bold and italic4 - underlined5 - bold and underlined6 - italic and underlined7 - bold, italic, and underlined(There is no need to actually specify the content, since that will not affect the answer.)The example earlier would be given as 333333220.OutputThe minimum number of,,,,, andtags required.InputInputInputInput013333332200011006612364012375303657213412303OutputOutputOutputOutput24654
